about_the_game:
WTC : Love's Labour's Lost is the third and last side-story in the "Welcome To... Chichester" visual novel series. This episode concentrates on Grendel's past



The city of Chichester was once an unassuming and lawful place. located on the southern tip of England. However, with the arrival of the megalomaniacal Grendel Jinx and her put-upon "friend", this soon changes as Grendel works her way into all aspects of local governance.

Not wanting to see another place fall under the control of Grendel, the protagonist devises a plan to take Grendel back to America but comes up against opposition on the form of Cindi Eglantine, the local tourist guide and “The Violet Hotel” waitress.

Together, they devise a counter-plan, although neither would realise the cost of stopping the protagonist.

This demo runs up until the first inter-class fight.

content_descriptors.notes:
Student bullying
Partial student fight scene

detailed_description:
WTC : Love's Labour's Lost is the third and last side-story in the "Welcome To... Chichester" visual novel series. This episode concentrates on Grendel's past



The city of Chichester was once an unassuming and lawful place. located on the southern tip of England. However, with the arrival of the megalomaniacal Grendel Jinx and her put-upon "friend", this soon changes as Grendel works her way into all aspects of local governance.

Not wanting to see another place fall under the control of Grendel, the protagonist devises a plan to take Grendel back to America but comes up against opposition on the form of Cindi Eglantine, the local tourist guide and “The Violet Hotel” waitress.

Together, they devise a counter-plan, although neither would realise the cost of stopping the protagonist.

This demo runs up until the first inter-class fight.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or later
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or later
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Version: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only) or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

name: WTC : Love's Labour's Lost Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 upwards
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones

short_description: The Violet Hotel's waitress and local tour guide are determined to foil the protagonist's plans to take Grendel back to America. Unfortunately, neither native is prepared for the cost of doing so.
